QuestData.Title: Dafeng, the Spirit of Air
QuestData.Description: If you listen long enough, the wind will carry the answer to you.$B$BDafeng, the spirit of air, has been scared from the skies by Zhao-Ren, the Onyx Serpent. He hides within the Chamber of Whispers, at the south side of the plateau.$B$BGo to him. Ji and I will join you there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Dafeng, the spirit of air, in the Chamber of Whispers.
QuestData.RewardText: Dafeng looks frightened as you approach, but settles a bit at the sound of your voice.
